metadata.title: CVE-2024-6826 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from11.2 before 17.3.6, 17.4 before 17.4.3, and 17.5 before 17.5.1. A denial ofservice could occur via importing a malicious crafted XML manifest file.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
